name: mapsnen

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wbr(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), cen, c0), wcel(c0, universe))

stmt.origin: mapsnend(c0, c1, universe, universe, wcel(c0, universe))

-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))

-| wcel(c0, universe)

-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))

|- wbr(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), cen, c0)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))

body.origin:

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(co(c0, cmap, csn(c1)), cen, c0)

comment: Set exponentiation to a singleton exponent is equinumerous to its base. Exercise 4.43 of [Mendelson] p. 255. (Contributed by NM, 17-Dec-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Nov-2014.) (Proof shortened by AV, 17-Jul-2022.)
